original_title: The End is Bigger Than Love
overview: It's months after am unexplained apocalypse has wiped out most of the country's population, and Dom is eking out a living in a remote desert hideaway. He inexplicably finds Leslie, who was once the love of his life. They try to reunite, but the weight of a painful past, an uncertain present, and an absent future may prove too much for them.
title: The End is Bigger Than Love
